Posts.Content: Jun 11, 2012 04:44PM pampam wrote: I just wanted to say hi, cate. i'm still coming to terms with my dx tho it has been 6 months now. will be having tests to see how the AI and radiation is/has worked. doing a lot of naturopathic things: pills, starting IV vit c therapy tomorrow morning, baking low carb bread, doing diet changes... all this to feel like i'm doing something. it's hard to relax yet i don't have much energy. it's hard to get with this new reality. it's good to read the posts of others who are further along and have taken the time to write down their encouragement and experience. just wanted to say i'm there with you. hugs, pam
Posts.Title: Feeling alone...and facing a new reality Sonata rosasmommy

Posts.Content: Jul 15, 2012 06:24PM pampam wrote: I just got a port in. it is now day 4 and most of the discomfort is gone. the first day i couldn't keep anything down and took percocets. 2nd day slept alot and stayed on the percocets but ate well that night. 3rd day up and around neck stiff and some soreness at the incision above the left breast. 4th day took the bandage off, soreness almost gone and almost back to normal.Â
